casebody.data:
PEREZ
v.
PEREZ 100P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 5, 2018 Elaine H. Ashley, William W. Jordan, Attorneys at Law, Greensboro, for Perez, Laurie S. David A. Perez, Attorney at Law, Thomasville, for Perez, David A.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of April 2018 by Plaintiff for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of April 2018."
